title: Atrial fibroblast-derived exosomal miR-21 upregulate myocardial KCa3.1 via the PI3K-Akt pathway during rapid pacing
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Fu Yuntao, Liang Jinjun, Liu Hua Fen, Chen Huiyu, Liu Dishiwen, Cao Zhen, Youcheng Wang, Xuewen Wang, Yuanjia Ke, Cheng Yanni, Guo Kexin, Peng Zhibin, Yang Mei, Qingyan Zhao
